title: D-Orbit and mHackeroni conduct in-orbit cybersecurity competition
summary: D-Orbit and Italian cybersecurity team mHackeroni organized CTRL+Space, Europe’s first in-orbit Capture-the-Flag (CTF) cybersecurity competition involving D-Orbit’s ION Satellite Carrier. The event, supported by ESA, aimed to identify vulnerabilities in satellite systems in a controlled environment.
why_it_matters: The event highlights the growing importance of cybersecurity in the space sector and demonstrates collaboration between industry and ethical hackers to address vulnerabilities in satellite systems.
